#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<cctype>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int ch[52][52];
int main()
{
    int n,t,i,j,x,s,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        x=0;
        for(i=1; i<=n; i++)
        {
            for(j=1; j<=n; j++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&ch[i][j]);
                if(i>1)
                {
                    ch[i][j]=ch[1][j]-ch[i][j];
                    if(j>1 && x==0)
                    {
                        s=ch[i][1];
                        if(ch[i][j]!=s)
                        {
                            x=1;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if(x==1)
            printf("No\n");
        else
            printf("Yes\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
